DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Asia, Europe, Japan and North America. The aim of this observational study is to evaluate the safety and effectiveness while using NovoMix® 30 during 26 weeks under normal clinical practice, in the countries participating in the study. The primary outcome is the incidence of major hypoglycaemic events reported as serious adverse drugs reaction conditions on hypoglycaemic events.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study of Safety and Effectiveness of NovoMix® 30 for the Treatment of Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
Insulin aspart, insulin aspart protamine drug combination 30:70
DOC.criteria: Age according to approved label and physician discretion Type 2 diabetes including newlydiagnosed subjects who have never received insulin or an insulin analogue before Subjects who previously enrolled in this study Subjects who are unlikely to comply with protocol requirements Hypersensitivity to biphasic insulin aspart or to any of the excipients Women who are pregnant, breast feeding or have the intention of becoming pregnant within next 12 months
